name: Splice Vice
description:
Welcome to Splice Nice, the DNA recomposition company.

Alter our clients' DNA to make them the best version they can be.  Research DNA patterns for the best results, and don't forget to keep your desk tidy!  Be careful though...  You'll get some strange results if you're too reckless!

Happy Splicing!

Splice Nice Management.

A ShenaniJam 2019 Submission

Theme: DNA Chaos

Achievements:

Healthy Living - Sleep for 8 hours per night, get an hour of exercise, and only eat healthy food for the duration of the jam.

One Punch Man - Your game is controllable with a single input.

Maverick - Your team size is 1.
